mapper.insert: insert into user_table(userId, email, pwd, nickname, phoneNum, lastDate, regDate) values(seq_user_table.nextval, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{nickname}, '010010010', sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select email from user_table where phoneNum=#{phoneNum}
